name: Deep Fish
description:
This game made in a very short amount of time (only 4 day) special for Fishing Jam 2 Game Jam.

It's a short, sad story of a lonely fisherman. He wants to catch the fish as much as possible and deal with debt. But the question is, can he?

Remember: The deeper you get, the greater the risk, but the greater the reward.

Thanks Zpz for great music.

Gamepad supported:

Left / Right arrow or L-stick - control of the boat and hook;

Z or A (gamepad) - fishing mode start, the second press: throw the hook

X or B (gamepad) - fishing mode stop. If you throw the hook, If you dropped a hook, he will come back.
